meanings.definition: A small metal plate covering the finger holes of a flute or similar wind instrument.
meanings.sent1: The fipples on the flute help produce different notes.
meanings.sent2: The musician carefully adjusted the fipples on the flute for the perfect sound.
meanings.sent3: When the fipples on the flute fell off, it sounded like a honking goose!
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced over the fipples of the flute, creating a melody that enchanted the audience.
meanings.sent5: The shiny fipples on the flute gleamed under the stage lights.

meanings.definition: A small projection on a pipe or similar object used to control the flow of liquid.
meanings.sent1: The plumber fixed the leak by adjusting the fipples on the pipe.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to turn the fipples on the faucet to regulate the water flow.
meanings.sent3: The fipples on the pipe seemed to have a mind of their own, causing water to spray everywhere!
meanings.sent4: She twisted the fipples on the hose, directing the water like a wizard casting a spell.
meanings.sent5: The old fountain had ornate fipples that added a touch of elegance to the garden.
meanings.sent6: After turning the fipples on the valve, the water flowed smoothly again.

meanings.definition: A slang term for the lips.
meanings.sent1: She applied lip balm to keep her fipples moisturized.
meanings.sent2: His fipples curled into a smile when he saw the surprise.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about having the plumpest fipples in town!
meanings.sent4: Her fipples quivered with excitement as she waited for the results.
meanings.sent5: The cold wind made her fipples turn a shade of pink.
